{{ error }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from '../services/auth.service'; import { User } from '../models/user.mode' import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register', templateUrl: './register.component.html', styleUrls: ['./register.component.css'] }) export class RegisterComponent { user: User = { name: '', email: '', password: '' } error: string | null = null; constructor(private authService: AuthService, private router: Router) {} onSubmit(): void { this.authService.registerUser(this.user).subscribe( (data: any) => { this.router.navigate(['/']); }, (error: any) => { console.error(error.error.error); this.error = error.error.error; } ); } }
